question: Out of the total number of electric vehicles being sold in India in the financial year 2019-20, the major portion was constituted by which type of vehicle?
explanation:
The Society of Manufacturers of Electric Vehicles (SMEV) has recently released information on the sales of the electric vehicles in the country in 2019-20.
As per SMEV, electric vehicles registered a 20 per cent increase in sales in 2019-20, when compared to the sales of previous year. The major portion of the sales is occupied by the low-speed scooters, which do not require registration with the transport authorities. About 97% of the electric two-wheelers sold was scooters.
